channel.title: Unity on Esau's Page
channel.description: Recent content in Unity on Esau's Page

item.title: Game Development Club Tutorial: Top Down Shooter
item.description: Welcome! Welcome to the top down shooter tutorial! The purpose of this blog is to be used to follow along during the game development club tutorial meeting but all are welcome to view this and learn from it! Getting Started Downloading Unity If you don’t already have Unity downloaded, go ahead and download the hub Hub Finishing signing in and navigate to the editor installation area Editor This tutorial will be using version 2021.
